items.title: Aurobindo Pharma, Dr Reddy's, Lupin, other pharma stocks tumble up to 3% amid tariff jitters

items.description: Nectar Life has been attempting to streamline its operations and strengthen its financial position in order to unlock shareholder value.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty trade flat amid tariff jitters; bank, energy stocks gain; smallcaps outperform

items.title: Siemens Energy India shares rise 2% after strong Q2; Jefferies initiates coverage with 'buy'
items.description: Siemens Energy India share price: Jefferies forecasts a 50 percent CAGR in earnings per share (EPS) and 30 percent revenue CAGR over FY24–27.

items.title: Adani Power shares rise on completing acquisition of Vidarbha Power

items.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank shares rally over 4% on strong Q1 business update; should you buy, sell or hold?
items.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank share price: Deposits saw solid traction, with end-of-period figures rising 14.6 percent year-on-year to Rs 5.13 lakh crore.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty may struggle for direction as trade tensions rise; key levels to track on July 8
items.description: In the previous session, Indian equities remained range-bound as traders stayed cautious ahead of fresh triggers such as trade deals and Q1 earnings.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex, Nifty trades flat; Titan, Trent, Sun Pharma top losers
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates:  Among sectoral laggards, Nifty Consumer Durables was the top loser, falling 1.7 percent. Nifty Pharma and Realty indices traded lower, down 0.5 percent each. On the gaining side, Nifty Private Bank rose 0.7 percent, followed by Nifty Oil & Gas and Nifty Metal, which were trading up 0.3 percent each

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: Wall Street's major indexes closed sharply lower on Monday, after US President Donald Trump announced hefty tariffs against Japan, South Korea and other trading partners
